trends: There have been 62 other sightings in Memphis
There were no other sightings in Memphis on or around April 15th 2012
Summary: observed disc,moving,straight line above tree tops.
divs: sighting detailsi fly model rockets,and i am interested in aviation.sunday was a windy day so we bought a kite.my girlfriend & i were flying the kite at snowden elem. school athletic field.this is in a glide path for our airport.we observed many large aircraft on close approach,landing in high wind conditions(engines rev up&down).across the field aprox.350ft.were trees aprox.150ft. high,as we faced north,(air traffic was flying north to south).my kite was tangled in a tree top when an object caught my eye.i tried to get my girlfriend's eyes trained on the object but it was behind the trees before she could see it.i saw a silver\grey disc that appeared to be over northeast memphis.the disc moved in a very straight line,at a steady speed,north-northwest,parallel to the horizon.this would have been flying into air traffic.the object was too far away to make size,speed,altitude observations.but,if i had to guess,based on my rocketry observations,the object was over north east memphis,500-1000ft.,moving 200-300mph,in a very steady straight line.i don't know what it was,but i know what it wasn't.we may have a photo,but we have dozens of photos to go thru.
